title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2503/97 of 15 December 1997 adjusting the maximum annual fishing effort for certain fisheries
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2503/97 of 15 December 1997 adjusting the maximum annual fishing effort for certain fisheries
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The maximum annual fishing effort for Germany in respect of demersal species using fixed gear, as referred to in Annex to Regulation (EC) No 2027/95, is amended, for 1997, as laid down in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 December 1997.
For the Commission
Emma BONINO
Member of the Commission
